name: The Siege of Candy Town
description:
This game was made in 9 days for the Godot Wild Jam #23! 

You're a fairy who lives in a candy world and has to defend her candy town from an ant raid. They're so big! 

The theme of the jam is “Tiny World” so we show how small our world is showing sweets as very BIG. The same happens with the ants and the mouse. Our sweet fairies are very tiny. The game kinda has a story in mind but we didn’t have the time to develop it. 

CONTROLS

Right: D or RIGHT arrow key, left joystick.

Left: A or LEFT arrow key, left joystick.

Jump: Spacebar or UP arrow key, Xbox A/Nintendo B button.

Attack/Kick: F or DOWN arrow key, Xbox B/Nintendo A button.

CREDITS

Programming: Steve Jaxon.

Art: Jess Andz.

Music & Sound Design: Anne Arcoíris /@antonyski18.
